body: Nami have always been the best gril. Should have gone for a harem route of atleast nami and mijin
I love this story, it was sexy, beautiful woman and very funny too
Well it was good but for me the ending is a bit bitter, i don't even know what happens to the character after that even nor time-skip but it was a good storyline and a plot though.
There are so many ups and downs in the storyline but the end is somewhat passable so it feels like I didn't waste my time seeing the story through the end. GOOD READ GOOD READ

Based on y'all reactions I thought this had a bad ending but it's quite good afterall tho?? The old dude got killed by God and Jae-Jin still got that hard d*ck going around. I also saw one guy commented "why didn't she just accept it" but we already know that Mi Jin is a Tsundere so of course she will accept the ring later on❤️ additionally i gotta admit from what @MrWonky said that the author added too many unnecessary drama and that is the only thing that's bad about this. Also liked how the way it ended since they're happy and all but if gotta rate the story overall then it would be 9/10😂👌🏽
AZAZIN56 I've read it from the beginning and I can honestly say that its shit. The author tried too hard to add unnecessary drama.
All of you saying this webtoon is bad should read the whole story the ending is kinda good but the author should have added the other girls what happened to them but over all its good
Why Author did not Harem End Mijin is a Bitch till the End thats it.
Why didn't she just accept it, but whatever
I'm actually happy with this bad ending, none of these characters deserved anything else.
The name of this Manwha is Stand Up.
